/usr/local/cuda-8.0/bin/nvcc       --expt-extended-lambda      -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/arrayfireops.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/predicate/predicate.cu.o CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/type_conversion/host_to_device.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/test_cuda.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -ldl
